data.name: Fluffy Friends 3
data.detailed_description:
In this game, some levels may seem insurmountable to you at first glance. But this, of course, is not: it is necessary slightly poraskinut brains - and find a way out! Incredible cosmic puzzle about the adventures of spherical and terribly cute monsters, seeking to reunite.

Features:

  • Developing and cute
  • Space-exciting game
  • A touching and colorful
  • Support for all platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux, SteamOS)

We all sometimes feel lonely. Our beings are also lonely. Due to their appearance, reminiscent of the typical monsters that are usually hidden under the bed, often yearn for each other. This time they found themselves in an unknown way somewhere in the vastness of space, in a new, immense mind and an amazing world full of dangers, riddles and treasures. In this adventure, you have to mediate and give these desperate creatures a helping hand, and depict it with all the necessary elements that are lacking in the fantastic world of the game. Are you really going to refuse to help them by looking at the big, touching eyes of these creatures?

data.short_description: Help the most good-natured monsters in the Universe get to each other. "Fluffy Friends 3" is a fun puzzle game in which you are given the opportunity to figure out how to overcome the next level, hand-painting something on the screen required for this part.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+, GLSL 1.2+, 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
